definitions.body: :Je 20:9; Job 20:26) fire (As. isûatu COT:Gloss, Syr. 0e4oto0, Eth. 0s4t: deriv. fr. II. [[אנשׁ]], 0’anasa, sociable, friendly element (MVWetzst in De:Psalmen, ed. 4, p. 888 Lag:BN 68 cf. 0nysh;, m0nwsh;), improb. esp. in view of As.; daghesh prob. secondary; cf. also Sta:§ 189 b)—´[[א]] abs. Ex 9:24 +; cstr. Le 6:2 + (seld.); † sf. [[אִשּׁוֹ]] De 4:36, Job 18:5; [[אֶשְׁכֶם]] Is 50:11; [[אִשָּׁם]] Is 66:24; —

fire, of conflagration, e.g. in briers, endangering or destroying crops [[תֵּחֵא אֵשׁ וּמָֽחְאָה קׂחִים]] Ex 22:5 cf. Ex 3:2 [[הַסְּנֶה בּׂעֵר בָּאֵשׁ]] (both E); more often of deliberate destruction by fire, esp. [[שָׂרַף בָּאֵשׁ]] ([[בָּ]] c. qam. preton.) obj. golden calf Ex 32:20 (J), other idols De 7:5, De 7:25, Asherim De 12:3, chariots Jos 11:6, Jos 11:9, 2Ki 23:1, house Ju Jdg 12:1, Jdg 14:15, tower Jdg 9:52, city-gates Ne 1:3, Ne 2:3, Ne 2:13, Ne 2:17, city Jos 6:24, Ju Jdg 18:27 cf. Is 1:7 +; also [[שִׁלַּח אֵשׁ בְּ]] Am 1:4, Am 1:7, Am 1:10 +; [[שִׁלַּח אֶת־הָעִיר בָּאֵשׁ]] † Ju Jdg 1:8, Jdg 20:48 cf. 2Ki 8:12; [[הִצִּית אֶת־הָעִיר בָּאֵשׁ]] Jos 8:8, Jos 8:19, Je 17:27 +, cf. Ju Jdg 9:49, 2Sa 14:30, 2Sa 14:31 (of field, cf. Ex 22:5 supr.)

of supernatural fire, attending theophany Ex 3:2, Ex 19:18 (both JE) De 4:11, De 4:12, De 4:15, De 4:33, De 4:36 +; specif. [[אֵשׁ]]([[הָ]])[[עַמּוּד ]] Ex 13:21, Ex 13:22, Ex 14:24 (all JE) Ne 9:12, Ne 9:19 cf. De 1:33 (v. [[מַרְאֵה־אֵשׁ]] Nu 9:15, Nu 9:16 P); of destructive fire from ´[[י]] Nu 11:1, Nu 11:2, Nu 11:3 (J) Nu 26:10 (P) Le 10:2 (P); cf. [[אׂכֶלָת]] ´[[א]] in sim. of Yahweh's glory Ex 24:17 (E) De 4:24, De 9:3; v. also 1Ki 18:24, 1Ki 18:38, 2Ki 1:10, 2Ki 1:10, 2Ki 1:12, 2Ki 1:12, 2Ki 1:14, Job 1:16 (perh. lightning intended), cf. further of lightning Ex 9:23, Ex 9:24 (JE) Ps 18:13, Ps 18:14, Ps 148:8 etc.

fire for cooking, roasting, parching, etc. [[חְלִי אֵשׁ]] roasted at a fire Ex 12:8, Ex 12:9 (P) cf. Le 2:14, 2Ch 35:13, Is 44:16, Is 44:19; of tinder for lighting fire Ge 22:6, Ge 22:7 (E); of fire for melting (gold for the idolatrous calf) Ex 32:24; for refining Je 6:29, where rd. with Qr [[מֵאֵשׁ תַּם עׂפֶרֶת]]; cf. Mal 3:2 (sim. of purifying work of messenger of cov’t).

esp. of altar-fire Le 1:7, Le 1:7, Le 6:2, Le 6:3, Le 6:5, Le 6:6 +; in offering incense Le 10:1, also [[אֵשׁ זׇרָה]] strange fire, i.e. an incense not commanded, offered presumptuously Le 10:1, Nu 3:4, Nu 26:61; fire from ´[[י]] consuming sacrifice (cf.

) Le 9:24, 2Ch 7:1, 2Ch 7:3; of fire in child-sacrifice (usually ([[לְ]])[[הֶעֱבִיר בֵּן בָּאֵשׁ ]]) 2Ki 16:3, 2Ki 21:6 cf. 2Ki 17:17, 2Ki 23:10, 2Ch 33:6; also ´[[שׂרף בָּא]] 2Ki 17:31, ´[[בער בָּא]] 2Ch 28:3.

fig. of Yahweh's anger Ps 89:47 (sim.) cf. Na 1:6, La 2:4 [[אֵשׁ־עֶבְרָתִי]] Ez Eze 21:31, Eze 22:31, Eze 38:19, [[אֵשׁ־קִנְאָתִי]] Ez Eze 36:5; v. also Is 66:15 Ps 79:5, Ps 89:47 etc.; of word of ´[[י]] Je 23:29; fig. of outbursting emotion Ps 39:4; of flagrant wickedness Is 9:17, etc:

in various combinations, [[לַפִּיד אֵשׁ]] Ge 15:17 (J) a torch of fire (cf. Di); [[לַבַּת־אֵשׁ]] Ex 3:2 flame of fire, [[לַהַב אֵשׁ]] Joe 2:5, [[לַפִּידֵי אֵשׁ]] (in sim.) Da 10:6 cf. Zec 12:6, [[לַהֲבוֹת]] [[אֵשׁ]] Ps 29:7 [[לַהֲבֵי אֵשׁ]] Is 66:15 cf. [[לְהָבוֹת]] ´[[א]] Ps 105:32, [[לָהָבָה]] ´[[נׁגַהּ א]] Is 4:5 cf. Ho 7:6; [[שְׁבִיב אִשּׁוֹ]] spark of his fire Job 18:5 cf. [[כִּידוֹדֵי אֵשׁ]] Job 41:11; [[תַּנּוּר אֵשׁ]] Ps 21:10 oven of fire, [[כִּיּוֹר אֵשׁ]] Zec 12:6; [[אוֹר אֵשׁ]] light of fire Ps 78:14; [[אֵשׁ לֽהֵט]] flaming fire Ps 104:4; [[לְשׁוֹן אֵשׁ]] Is 5:24 tongue of fire, [[גַּחֲלֵי אֵשׁ]] Ez Eze 1:13 coals of fire, so Eze 10:2, cf. [[רִשְׁפֵּי אֵשׁ]] Ct So 8:6; on [[אַבְנֵי אֵשׁ]] Ez Eze 28:14, Eze 28:16 v. [[אֶבֶן]]; [[אֵשׁ דַּת]] De 33:2, lit. fire of a law, or fire was a law, but [[דָּת]] law is Pers. & late; rd. perh. [[דׂת]][[[לַפִּ]]][[אֵשׁ ]] cf. Ex 20:18 or [[דֶת]][[[יׁקֶ]]][[אֵשׁ ]] cf. Is 65:5.
